sentences.english: The lion is the king of animals.
I was sent by the god, to rule all the animals.
sentences.chinese: 我是天帝派来管理百兽的。

sentences.english: In fact, it's second only to the King of Beasts among the African predators.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，它在非洲的捕食者中仅排在百兽之王之后。

sentences.english: A lion which is strongest among beasts, and turneth not away for any;
sentences.chinese: 就是狮子乃百兽中最为猛烈，无所躲避的。

sentences.english: You are nothing but a big coward.
sentences.chinese: 百兽之王不应该是一个胆小鬼，”稻草人说。

sentences.english: The animals take cover; they remain in their dens.
sentences.chinese: 百兽进入穴中，卧在洞内。

sentences.english: Surely the mountains bring him forth food, where all the beasts of the field play.
sentences.chinese: 诸山给它出食物，也是百兽游玩之处。

sentences.english: The lion is considered the king of the forest as it is a symbol of courage and power.
sentences.chinese: 狮子被看作百兽之王，是因为它是勇气与权利的象征。

sentences.english: Thus the fox used the tiger.
sentences.chinese: 就这样，狐狸借着老虎在百兽面前威风了一次。

sentences.english: Lion symbolizes power and the elevated status since it is the king of animals.
sentences.chinese: 狮是百兽之王，象征权势和地位。

sentences.english: The lion is called the king of beasts.
The very first title was King of Beasts.
sentences.chinese: 而最初的名字纠正《百兽之王》。

sentences.english: Thou makest darkness, and it is night: wherein all the beasts of the forest do creep forth.
sentences.chinese: 你造黑暗为夜，林中的百兽就都爬出来。

sentences.english: Tiger with the king of beasts, the penis and bearing a proudly.
sentences.chinese: 虎以百兽之王著称，有着傲然的雄风与气度。

sentences.english: Thus the fox borrowed the tiger's terror and showed its authority before the animals.
sentences.chinese: 就这样，狐狸借着老虎在百兽面前威风了一次。

sentences.english: I'm appointed by God as the King of the animal world.
sentences.chinese: 我是天帝派来的百兽之王。

definition: birds and animals/the beasts of the field and the birds of the air
White Tiger (the seven mansions of the west sky)/(slang) hairless female genitalia

four divinities/four divine emperors/four mythical creatures symbolic of prosperity and longevity, namely the phoenix 鳳|凤[feng4], turtle 龜|龟[gui1], dragon 龍|龙[long2] and Chinese unicorn 麒麟[qi2 lin2]/also 四象[si4 xiang4], the four division of the sky
Blue Dragon, other name of the Azure Dragon 青龍|青龙 (the seven mansions of the east sky)
to overawe/to be scared into submission
